title: Abortion: a tale of two cities
brief_description: Uses two dramatised case studies to highlight some of the problems faced by different sections of the community, in the provision of abortion. Intended for women’s groups and for people concerned with health education. Cast includes: Judy Snape, Marlene Sidaway, Max Smith, Derry Jordan, Fred Grant. Narrated by Peter Ellis.
